desc: Craft Beer Delivery in Buffalo and Erie County

layout.text:
Founded in 2017, Fattey Beer Company is a bottle shop, tap room and a craft community experience. Open daily from 12:00-10:30pm.
We are dog friendly, people friendly and feature a large selection of craft beer, wine, cider, seltzer, sodas, non-alcholic drinks, snacks and a world famous chicken sandwich. Fattey Beer has an active Mug Club of beer enthusiasts, indoor seating, outdoor seating and beer delivery. Hope to see you soon!
Cheers, Fattey Beer
